sqlMap.insert: insert into imageTest(num, subject, saveFileName) values(#num#,#subject#,#saveFileName#)
sqlMap.select: select num, subject, saveFileName from imageTest where num = #num#
select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select num, subject, saveFileName from imageTest order by num desc) data) where rnum >= #start# and rnum <= #end#
